name: Widget Manager Light
author: OTWthemes

sections.description:
Widget Manager gives you full control over widget visibility via nice and easy interface.

Every widget can now be displayed on or hidden from one or few pages. Display relevent content on your pages, posts, categories, tags, archives, custom post types, custom taxonomies, page templates, WordPress service pages, etc..

Upgrade to the Pro version of this plugin – the worlds most complete Sidebar and Widget management system for WordPress including regular updates and premium support:
Sidebar and Widget Manager | Demo site

Display widgets based on language(WMPL plugin) or user role is available as well.

Support for WooCommerce plugin, bbPress plugin and BuddyPress plugin has been added too.

This plugin works with all widgedets – WordPress default and any custom added widget.

The interface is very intuitive and requires no coding knowledge at all.

How Widget Manager Light works

  • Go to Appearance -> Widgets.
  • Select a Widget in any sidebar.
  • Click on the Set Visibility button.
  • Select where to display on or hide from.
sections.installation: Please refer to online documentation page for more details and screenshots.

Updating to versiion 1.3 or higher requires deactivation of the old version first! More info here

1.18

  • Updated: Core components

1.17

  • Updated: Support of WordPress Gutenberg Block Editor
  • Updated: Use strict mode for javascript
  • Updated: Escape html attributes

1.16

  • Updated: OTW core functions

1.15

  • Updated: latest version of OTW factory
  • Fixed: error mode modification

1.14

  • Updated: menu ordering
  • Updated: domain name
  • Updated: WordPress 4.8 compatibility

1.13

  • Updated: WordPress 4.7.x compatibility
  • Updated: OTW core functions

1.12

  • Updated: WordPress 4.5 compatibility
  • Updated: OTW core functions

1.11

  • Fixed: Visibility tabs posts pagination

1.10

  • Updated: use wp build in function for plugin url

1.9

  • Added: All posts from category/tag except some post ids option

1.8

  • Updated: replace depricated functions

1.7

  • Updated: new nicer interface
  • Added: More flexible filters

1.6

  • Added: BuddyPress plugin support

1.5

  • Updated: WPML plugin translated and not translated languages display
  • Updated: WPML plugin function registration verification

1.4

  • Added: WPML plugin support
  • Added: WooCommerce plugin support
  • Added: bbPress plugin support
  • Added: User role filter
  • Added: All posts from tag filter
  • Added: All posts from custom taxonomy filter
  • Added: Authors filter
  • Updated: Better compatibility on a single WP installation for Widgetize Pages Light, Sidebar Manager Light, Widget Manager Light, Sidebar Widget Manager full version

1.3

  • Added: Full support for posts, categories, tags, archives, custom post types, custom taxonomies, page templates, WordPress service pages, etc.
  • Added: Convinient filters
  • Updated: Activation method and replacement functionality

1.2

  • Fix: Loading path
  • Fix: Plugin’s dirname and url paths
  • Fix: Compatibility on a single WP installation for Widgetize Pages Light, Sidebar Manager Light, Widget Manager Light

1.0

  • Initial release

short_description: Widget Manager lets you control on which pages widgets appear via nice and easy interface. Show or hide widgets. Display relevant content on your page …
